attributes.action: allow us to continue to combine private and NHS medical care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Health secretary Alan Johnson has ruled that patients can no longer combine private medical treatment with the NHS because it creates a 2 tier system.

We the public pay for our NHS and we also pay for our privite treatment. There are places outside England but within the United Kingdom where treatment and prescriptions are free and it is the public who pay for the NHS and Private medical care. Do not let this goverment take away or change what we are entitled to.
